org.nerd4j.csv.field.validator

Class AbstractCSVFieldValidator<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nerd4j.csv.field.validator.AbstractCSVFieldValidator<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - type of the value to check.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CSVProcessOperation, CSVFieldValidator<V>, CSVRegistryEntry
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckNumberRange, CheckRegEx, CheckStringLength

    public abstract class AbstractCSVFieldValidator<V>
extends Object
implements CSVFieldValidator<V>
    Abstract implementation of the CSVFieldValidator interface that performs the expected behavior and modifies the CSVFieldProcessContext accordingly with the framework execution policy.

    Any custom implementation of the CSVFieldValidator interface should extend this class.

    Author:
    Nerd4j Team

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorMessagePattern

        public String getErrorMessagePattern()
        Returns a message pattern as described in the MessageFormat class.

        The placeholders in this pattern coincide with fields of the CSVFieldProcessContext as follows:

        • {0} = columnName;
        • {1} = originalValue;
        • {2} = convertedValue.
        Specified by:
        getErrorMessagePattern in interface CSVProcessOperation
        Returns:
        the pattern to use to build the error message.

      • apply

        public void apply(V value,
                  CSVFieldProcessContext context)
        Applies the current validation, in case of failure modifies the execution context accordingly.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface CSVFieldValidator<V>
        Parameters:
        value - value to check.
        context - the field process execution context.

      • performValidation

        protected abstract boolean performValidation(V value)
        Performs the validation, and returns true if the validation succeeds and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        value - value to check.
        Returns:
        true if the validation succeeds, false otherwise.
